pages.text: To store an already placed turret without destroying it, you need this crate. Once a turret is placed inside (either via dismantling it with the $(l:misc/tcu)TCU$(/l) or due to the $(l:upgrades/safe)Turret Safe upgrade$(/l) activating), you can then open it like a chest and grab its contents.$(br2)$(italic)Note: you cannot insert anything in this.$()
If you transfer ammo from the crate via shift-clicking, it'll try to fill up available $(l:ammo/cartridge)ammo cartridges$(/l) first before putting the items into your inventory.
